de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.display.model

Class Relation

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.display.model.Relation

  • public class Relation
extends Object
    A relation between span annotations -> an arc annotation. Example "relations":[["d_48420","SUBJ",[["Arg1","p_21346"],["Arg2","p_21341"]]],...
    Author:
    Seid Muhie Yimam, Richard Eckart de Castilho
